column2: death=Killed by [[Ecthelion]] during the [[Fall of Gondolin]]

column1: '''Orcobal''' was the chief champion of the [[orcs]] present at the [[Fall of Gondolin]]. He was slain by [[Ecthelion
column2: Ecthelion of the Fountain]], who "cleft the head of Orcobal [...] to his teeth" before the gates of [[Gondolin]].<ref name="LT2Gondolin">{{LT2
